surname Guo

sentences.english: The comparison of lasting strategic effects of CPC and KMT.
sentences.chinese: 国共两党持久战略效果之比较。

sentences.english: CPC and KMT arrived at an agreement to counterattack the Japanese invaders together.
sentences.chinese: 国共两党达成一致共同抵抗日本侵略者。

sentences.english: And all we known, both PRC and ROC gave up Japan, s war reparations.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，国共两党都免除了日本的战争赔款。

sentences.english: In addition, both the Communist Party of China and the GMD make an great contribution on the exaltation of the Chinese international position.
sentences.chinese: 国共两党都为中国国际地位的提高做出了重大的贡献。

sentences.english: Huai Hai Campaign was the last major combat between two Chinese political parties.
sentences.chinese: 淮海战役是国共两党所率军队之间最大的战役。

sentences.english: And would he have influenced thebrewing Nationalist/Communist divide?
sentences.chinese: 会对国共两党当时正在酝酿的分裂产生影响吗？

sentences.english: IV. The comparison of lasting strategic effects of CPC and KMT.
sentences.chinese: 国共两党持久战略效果之比较。

definition: United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)

nationalist forces
